attacks.name: Devastating Wind
attacks.text: Your opponent shuffles their hand into their deck and draws 3 cards.

attacks.name: Slashing Strike
attacks.text: This Pokémon can't use Slashing Strike during your next turn.

attacks.name: Cross-Cut
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is an Evolution Pokémon, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Hurricane Punch
attacks.text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 50 damage for each heads.

cards.name: Tauros-GX
text: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Rage
attacks.text: This attack does 10 more damage for each damage counter on this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Mad Bull-GX
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage for each damage counter on this Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

ability.name: Energy Evolution
ability.text: When you attach a basic Energy card from your hand to this Pokémon during your turn, you may search your deck for a card that evolves from this Pokémon that is the same type as that Energy card and put it onto this Pokémon to evolve it. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Quick Draw
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, draw a card.

attacks.name: Teeter Punch
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Work Up
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon's attacks do 20 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

ability.name: Treasure Hunt
ability.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may put an Item card from your discard pile into your hand.

attacks.name: Ferocious Bellow
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon's attacks do 50 less damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Rock Smash
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.

attacks.name: Bullet Seed
attacks.text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Echoed Voice
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon's Echoed Voice attack does 60 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Beak Blast
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

cards.name: Gumshoos-GX

ability.name: Search the Premises
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may have your opponent reveal their hand.

text: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Gumshoe Chance-GX
attacks.text: This attack does 50 more damage times the amount of Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Bear Hug
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Superpower
attacks.text: You may do 40 more damage. If you do, this Pokémon does 20 damage to itself.

ability.name: Instruct
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may draw cards until you have 3 cards in your hand.

attacks.name: Psychic
attacks.text: This attack does 20 more damage times the amount of Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

cards.name: Lillie
text: Draw cards until you have 6 cards in your hand. If it's your first turn, draw cards until you have 8 cards in your hand.

cards.name: Big Malasada
text: Heal 20 damage and remove a Special Condition from your Active Pokémon.

cards.name: Crushing Hammer
text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy from 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

cards.name: Energy Retrieval
text: Put 2 basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your hand.

cards.name: Energy Switch
text: Move a basic Energy from 1 of your Pokémon to another of your Pokémon.

cards.name: Exp. Share
text: When your Active Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from an opponent's attack, you may move 1 basic Energy card from that Pokémon to the Pokémon this card is attached to.

cards.name: Great Ball
text: Look at the top 7 cards of your deck. You may reveal a Pokémon you find there and put it into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

cards.name: Hau
text: Draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Poison Barb
text: If the Pokémon this card is attached to is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), the Attacking Pokémon is now Poisoned.

cards.name: Poké Ball
text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Pokémon Catcher
text: Flip a coin. If heads, switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with their Active Pokémon.

cards.name: Potion
text: Heal 30 damage from 1 of your Pokémon.

cards.name: Rare Candy
text: Choose 1 of your Basic Pokémon in play. If you have a Stage 2 card in your hand that evolves from that Pokémon, put that card onto the Basic Pokémon to evolve it. You can't use this card during your first turn or on a Basic Pokémon that was put into play this turn.

cards.name: Repel
text: Your opponent switches their Active Pokémon with 1 of their Benched Pokémon.

cards.name: Rotom Dex
text: After counting your Prize cards, shuffle them into your deck. Then, take that many cards from the top of your deck and put them face down as your Prize cards.

cards.name: Switch
text: Switch your Active Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

cards.name: Team Skull Grunt
text: Your opponent reveals their hand. Discard 2 Energy cards from it.

cards.name: Timer Ball
text: Flip 2 coins. For each heads, search your deck for an Evolution Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Ultra Ball
text: Discard 2 cards from your hand. If you do, search your deck for a Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Double Colorless Energy
text: Double Colorless Energy provides ColorlessColorless Energy.

cards.name: Rainbow Energy
text: This card provides Colorless Energy. While in play, this card provides every type of Energy but provides only 1 Energy at a time. When you attach this card from your hand to 1 of your Pokémon, put 1 damage counter on that Pokémon.

cards.name: Lurantis-GX
text: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Flower Supply
attacks.text: Attach 2 basic Energy cards from your discard pile to your Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Solar Blade
attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Chloroscythe-GX
attacks.text: This attack does 50 damage times the amount of Grass Energy attached to this Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

cards.name: Lapras-GX
text: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Collect
attacks.text: Draw 3 cards.

attacks.name: Blizzard Burn
attacks.text: This Pokémon can't attack during your next turn.

attacks.name: Ice Beam-GX
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

cards.name: Espeon-GX
text: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Psybeam
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Psychic
attacks.text: This attack does 30 more damage times the amount of Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Divide-GX
attacks.text: Put 10 damage counters on your opponent's Pokémon in any way you like. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

cards.name: Lunala-GX

ability.name: Psychic Transfer
ability.text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move a Psychic Energy from 1 of your Pokémon to another of your Pokémon.

text: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Moongeist Beam
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't be healed during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Lunar Fall-GX
attacks.text: Knock Out 1 of your opponent's Basic Pokémon that isn't a Pokémon-GX. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

cards.name: Umbreon-GX
text: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Strafe
attacks.text: You may switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Shadow Bullet
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Dark Call-GX
attacks.text: Discard 2 Energy from your opponent's Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

cards.name: Solgaleo-GX

ability.name: Ultra Road
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may switch your Active Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

text: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Sunsteel Strike
attacks.text: Discard all Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Sol Burst-GX
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 5 Energy cards and attach them to your Pokémon in any way you like. Then, shuffle your deck. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

cards.name: Tauros-GX
text: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Rage
attacks.text: This attack does 10 more damage for each damage counter on this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Mad Bull-GX
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage for each damage counter on this Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

cards.name: Gumshoos-GX

ability.name: Search the Premises
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may have your opponent reveal their hand.

text: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Gumshoe Chance-GX
attacks.text: This attack does 50 more damage times the amount of Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

cards.name: Ilima
text: Each player shuffles their hand into their deck and flips a coin. If heads, that player draws 6 cards. If tails, they draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Lillie
text: Draw cards until you have 6 cards in your hand. If it's your first turn, draw cards until you have 8 cards in your hand.

cards.name: Professor Kukui
text: Draw 2 cards. During this turn, your Pokémon's attacks do 20 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

cards.name: Team Skull Grunt
text: Your opponent reveals their hand. Discard 2 Energy cards from it.
